sentence: The inability to trade for Stafford and Fitzpatrick's injury left Heinicke under center, and he responded by completing 65 percent of his passes for 3,419 yards, 20 touchdowns and 15 interceptions as someone who could make big plays but also struggled with consistency and turnovers.
author: Scott Polacek
title: NFL Rumors: WFT Preparing to Take 'Big Swing' at a QB During Offseason

sentence: Still, the broken-down talks ended up being a deflating moment for Washington, which settled for journeyman Ryan Fitzpatrick before turning to Taylor Heinicke for most of the season once the former got hurt in Week 1.
author: Matthew Paras
title: Rams-Bengals a ‘What if?’ bowl for Commanders

sentence: Washington Commanders: Desmond Ridder, QB, Cincinnati After trading for Alex Smith, using a first-round pick on Dwayne Haskins and trotting out journeymen like Taylor Heinicke and Ryan Fitzpatrick, the Commanders need to try and develop a real franchise quarterback.
author: Tribune News Service
title: 2022 NFL mock draft (Version 2.0): Forget the buzz. Here’s what each team should do in the first round
